definitions.definition: An expression of affection , especially romantic affection, usually in the form of greeting card , gift, or message given the object of one's affection, especially on February 14th.
examples: Such an extravagant valentine was unexpected.

definitions.definition: A person to whom a valentine is given or from whom it is received, especially on February 14th.

main_definition: An expression of affection , especially romantic affection, usually in the form of greeting card , gift, or message given the object of one's affection, especially on February 14th.
secondary_definitions: A person to whom a valentine is given or from whom it is received, especially on February 14th.
